# GitHub Copilot Instructions

This is a GitHub Pages repository for danamic.github.io.

## Repository Overview

This repository hosts a simple GitHub Pages site that redirects to beta.danishlukawski.com via the CNAME file.

## Guidelines

- This is a minimal GitHub Pages repository
- The CNAME file contains the domain redirect configuration
- Keep the repository structure simple and focused on static site hosting
- Follow GitHub Pages best practices for any web content additions
- Maintain the existing CNAME configuration unless specifically updating the domain

## File Structure

- `CNAME`: Contains the custom domain configuration for GitHub Pages
- `README.md`: Basic repository documentation
